TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContextUtil extends System.Object

summary.span: 获取有关 COM+ 对象上下文的信息。

span.span: Obtains information about the COM+ object context.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用于获取 COM + 上下文信息的首选类。 is the preferred class to use for obtaining COM+ context information. 由于此类的成员全部 `static` （`shared` 在 Visual Basic 中），因此，在使用之前无需对其进行实例化。Because the members of this class are all `static` (`shared` in Visual Basic), it is not necessary to instantiate it before using them. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 创建事务 。The following code example demonstrates how to use to create a transactional . [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 COM+ 上下文中的 位。

span.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.

value.span: 如果该方法返回时将停用此对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object is to be deactivated when the method returns; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM + `done` 位确定对象在完成其工作后保持活动状态的时间，并且可能会影响事务的持续时间。The COM+ `done` bit determines how long the object remains active after finishing its work and can affect the duration of a transaction. 当方法调用返回时，COM + 将检查 `done` 位。When a method call returns, COM+ inspects the `done` bit. 如果 `true``done` 位，COM + 将停用该对象。If the `done` bit is `true`, COM+ deactivates the object. 如果 `false``done` 位，则不会停用该对象。If the `done` bit is `false`, the object is not deactivated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，以确保在方法调用后停用 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to ensure that a is deactivated after a method call. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]

exception.span: 没有可用的 COM+ 上下文。

span.span: There is no COM+ context available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DisableCommit() cil managed

summary.span: 在 COM+ 上下文中将 位和 位设置为 。

span.span: Sets both the bit and the bit to in the COM+ context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果系统询问，COM + 上下文会投票中止当前事务，但不会在方法返回时停用该对象。If asked, the COM+ context votes to abort the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServicesContextUtil#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesContextUtil/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServicesContextUtil#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesContextUtil/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesContextUtil#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesContextUtil/VB/class1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 没有 COM+ 上下文可用。

span.span: No COM+ context is available.

summary.span: 在 COM+ 上下文中将 位设置为 ，并将 位设置为 。

span.span: Sets the bit to and the bit to in the COM+ context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果系统提示，COM + 上下文将提交当前事务，但不会在方法返回时停用该对象。If asked, the COM+ context will commit the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 方法。The following code example calls the method. Public Shared Property MyTransactionVote As TransactionVote

member this.MyTransactionVote : System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionVote with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 COM+ 上下文中的 位。

span.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.
One of the values, either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `Commit`时，COM + `consistent` 位设置为 `true`，COM + 上下文投票将提交事务。When is set to `Commit`, the COM+ `consistent` bit is set to `true` and the COM+ context votes to commit the transaction. 如果 设置为 `Abort`，则 `consistent` 位设置为 `false`，COM + 上下文投票以中止事务。If is set to `Abort`, the `consistent` bit is set to `false` and the COM+ context votes to abort the transaction. `consistent` 位 `true`的默认值。The default value of the `consistent` bit is `true`. `consistent` 位将投票转换为提交或中止执行它的事务，并由 `done` 位来完成投票。The `consistent` bit casts a vote to commit or abort the transaction in which it executes, and the `done` bit finalizes the vote. 当 `done` 位设置为方法调用返回 `true` 或对象停用时，COM + 将检查 `consistent` 位。COM+ inspects the `consistent` bit when the `done` bit is set to `true` on a method call return or when the object deactivates. 尽管对象的 `consistent` 位可以在每个方法调用中重复更改，但仅上一个更改计数。Although an object's `consistent` bit can change repeatedly within each method call, only the last change counts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性创建事务 。The following code example demonstrates how to use property to create a transactional . [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]

exception.span: 没有可用的 COM+ 上下文。
